newsitem.title: GERMANY: Thai tapioca exports seen tight up to Jan -Toepfer.
newsitem.headline: Thai tapioca exports seen tight up to Jan -Toepfer.

text.p: Tapioca export availability will remain tight until December/January, German feeds trader Alfred C Toepfer said in its latest monthly newsletter.
Nearby supplies carried a premium but distant prices were still reasonable, Toepfer said on Friday.
It forecast Thailand's 1996/97 tapioca root crop at 18 million tonnes, which it said was slightly higher than the 1995/96 crop.
Official crop estimates were expected to be released at origin next week, Toepfer said.
Rotterdam fob prices of Thai tapioca hard pellets, customs cleared, were 23.25 marks per 100 kg on Thursday, afloat and August. This compared with 22.75 marks in early August.
September-December pellets were at 22.60 marks and January-June at 21.70 marks.
